subject: New review (1★) of Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback (from Shawn C.)
description_text: Rating: 1 | Review Text: I connected all 3 to my pedals and was abled to enjoy them for about an hour ,after that they have not worked again since ,ive tried everything from earthing to changing cables and usb ports , ive spent way to long now , more time trying to get them working then i have enjoying them , for the hour they worked they were amazing , I am very disappointed and have gone and searched for another manufacturer. a more reputable and reliable 1. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ This review was automatically published.Learn more You have a new 1-star review of Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback from Shawn Cassin shawn.cassin@netspace.net.au Shawn Cassin Display name: Shawn C. I connected all 3 to my pedals and was abled to enjoy them for about an hour ,after that they have not worked again since ,ive tried everything from earthing to changing cables and usb ports , ive spent way to long now , more time trying to get them working then i have enjoying them , for the hour they worked they were amazing , I am very disappointed and have gone and searched for another manufacturer. a more reputable and reliable 1.
